title: Ticket #3594: Regression Test Ideas and Work
description:
Below are some of the current thoughts for new regression tests. Ideas about how to test theses things would be nice:
  1. cuncurrency test work for non-queue n job growth #4504 from bug #4503
  2. non-windows test still green with shared port master die #4475
  3. what happens to testing with share port daemon on. #4485
  4. validate condor status can take addds from a file see #4414
  5. validate if can't runas owner run as slot-user see #4389
  6. Schedd restart testing #4472 and windows bugs encountered #4470 #4471 #4515 and linux #4474
  7. classad_cache-basic on windows bug #4449
  8. create usable setup for workstation testing #4441
  9. condor_q output check - #4425 regression test for #4420
  10. test job rank #4445, example on how to do so included in gt #4403
  11. case insensitive if/ else, last gpu ticket
  12. Config file #include #4322 referring to #4319
  13. Meta-knobs #4310 referring to #4031
  14. Glue refactoring #4306
  15. condor_urlfetch_test #4307
  16. condor_config_val -set/rset test #4303
  17. GPU discovery including offline marking #4177 #4295 #4320
  18. Ensure a massive config file works 1000 entries growing to 12k #4293
  19. Agressive Flocking #4287
  20. if/ else in config files See #4211 for docs ticket #4290
  21. Tests for knobs NEGOTIATOR_MAX_TIME_PER_CYCLE, NEGOTIATOR_MAX_TIME_PER_USER. See #4271 for ideas on how to test.
  22. The two tests which work submit file coverage and massive values #4269
  23. Next focus: >128 lines in submit file, GPU and Param tests
  24. Revisit java tests due to windows 8 failures #4262
  25. Go through cmd_q tests looking for improvements #4232
  26. Fix and enhance GSI test after updating certs etc till 2023 #4221
  27. Test infrastructure - Two changes in personal condor startups #4220
  28. Windows Tests we want #4215
  29. Get latest msconfig tools windows test world and set path for tests #4188
  30. GPU Discovery and Configuration
  31. Work Fetch test - for example, would be nice to have a regression test #4219 for bug fix #3669 and windows has issues #4228
  32. Switch to condor_who data analysis for condor personal up/down #4149
  33. Modernize cmd_statustests(they are slow) #4147
  34. Tests bleeding personal condors, recheck list #4129
  35. Log Rotation Tests #3948
  36. concurrency limits test did only static slots #4112
  37. Test which fail when nmi busy #3990
  38. New style test to generate a code file from a condor daemon #3963
  39. Testing Framework Personal Condors #3944
  40. Improve CORE file and ERROR statement handling in test framework #3964
  41. remote condor_config_val dump and verbose #3945
  42. Updates to V8.0 branch #3932
  43. Test failures from overly simple calls on various condor tools #3916
  44. Stress test via workspace parallel testing #3912
  45. Testing batch_test.pl interactive use on windows #3899
  46. Sort through new test for inclusion on windows #3895
  47. When PCondor does not come up use tools like condor_who -v and log dir listings to give more help. #3913
  48. param value completeness checking #3877

  49. Python bindings verification #3878
  50. Non-executable causes starter to hang up on shadow causing forever time rollbacks and reconnect attempts #3898
  51. Per-daemon overrides #3845
  52. replacement tests (new test using new tools) #3844
  53. condor_submit -spool #3840
  54. lib_shared_port-check-ports_van.run #3836
  55. complete shadow memory test #3825
  56. Windows trailing / to move folder contents #3939
  57. Memory tracking test #3784
  58. Sporadically failing tests(ie RED). #3741
  59. Tests waiting on defects #3954
  60. Dynamic Local Resources #3609 reference #2905
  61. job_services_during_neg_cycle(condor_userprio) #3615 reference #3535
  62. condor_ping #3646
  63. Verify Job Exit Code gets to classad #3614
  64. Audit Log #3637
  65. Bologna batch system #3654
  66. condor_rm 1; Windows file transfer #3760
  67. CPU Affinity #3598
  68. Concurrency Limits #3599
  69. DAGMAN jobs conflict with themselves if any one job is run twice at the same time. #3920
  70. Soap (in testing) #3583
  71. shadow reconnects(close needs input) #3582
  72. negotiator match log(done) #3581
  73. look at condorc_ab_van.run on windows
  74. why do 2 concurrency or more at once cause personals to not start in time?
  75. cross tests to slx and xp #3733
  76. The unit test labelled "Test that Cd2TmpDir() returns true and changes the current working directory to a temporary directory returned from calling temp_dir_path()." fails if a directory in the full path to the tmp dir is a symlink -- the expected directory is the symlink, but the returned directory is canonicalized. Can probably be fixed by canonicalizing the expected dir.
  77. Old soap test turned off till we can fix 6/27/13
  78. Convert old tests to new style so it is more clear what they are doing by viewing .run file

remarks:
2013-May-01 10:47:31 by bbockelm:
What about a test to verify that the job's ExitCode is propagated into the ClassAd? It would be nice to have a test for this bug:

https://htcondor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktview?tn=3577
